body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is Billy Powell and I represent Secure Auto Solutions. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Julie Clark.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julie. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes sure, my date of birth is five zero three one nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julie. I also need to verify your account. Could you kindly provide the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number ends with two four eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julie, for providing that information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for your time, Julie. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out to us. Have a wonderful day!
